sen.j: 岡橋 治助（おかはし じすけ、文政8年12月14日 (旧暦)（1826年1月21日） - 大正2年（1913年）11月2日）は、日本の実業家。
sen.e: Jisuke OKAHASHI (January 21, 1826 – November 2, 1913) was a Japanese businessman.
Jisuke OKAHASHI (January 21, 1826 – November 2, 1913) was a Japanese businessman.
Jisuke OKAHASHI (January 21, 1826 – November 2, 1913) was a Japanese businessman.

sen.j: 三十四銀行頭取、天満紡績社長。
sen.e: He was a todori (chief) of the Sanjyushi Bank and was a president of Tenma Boseki.
sen.cmt: 三十四銀行の読み方不明です。
sen.e: He was a todori (chief) of the Sanjyushi Bank and was a president of Tenma Boseki.
He was a todori (chief) of the Sanjushi Bank and was a president of Tenma Boseki.

sen.j: 大和国十市郡（現奈良県田原本町）出身。
sen.e: He was born in Toichi-gun, Yamato Province (present Tawaramoto-cho, Nara Prefecture).
He was born in Toichi-gun, Yamato Province (present Tawaramoto-cho, Nara Prefecture).
He was born in Toichi-gun, Yamato Province (present Tawaramoto-cho, Nara Prefecture).
His childhood name was Tomekichi.
His childhood name was Tomekichi.
His childhood name was Tomekichi.
He changed his name to Kiyozaemon later.
sen.cmt: 清左衛門が、きよざえもんか、せいざえもんか不明です。
sen.e: He changed his name to Kiyozaemon later.
He changed his name to Kiyozaemon later.

sen.j: 天保13年（1842年）大坂に出て、太物商島屋で商売見習をし、安政3年（1856年）島屋の別家油屋治助の店を持ち、木綿商をはじめ、大阪屈指の木綿問屋となる。
sen.e: In 1842, he came to Osaka and became a trainee at Shimaya dealing with futomono (cotton cloth and hemp cloth) and in 1856, he had a shop of Jisuke ABURAYA which was a branch family of Shimaya and started as a cotton merchant and became one of the best cotton warehouse merchant in Osaka.

In 1842, he came to Osaka and became a trainee at Shimaya dealing with futomono (cotton cloth and hemp cloth) and in 1856, he had a shop of Jisuke ABURAYA which was a branch family of Shimaya and started as a cotton merchant and became one of the best cotton warehouse merchant in Osaka.

In 1842, he came to Osaka and became a trainee at Shimaya dealing with futomono (cotton cloth and hemp cloth) and in 1856, he had a shop of Jisuke ABURAYA which was a branch family of Shimaya and started as a cotton merchant and became one of the best cotton warehouse merchant in Osaka.

sen.j: 明治11年（1878年）第三十四国立銀行（三和銀行の前身）を設立、頭取に就任。
sen.e: In 1878, he established Thirty-fourth Shikoku National Bank (The former Sanwa Bank) and assumed Todori (chief).
sen.cmt: 第三十四国立銀行の読み方不明です。
sen.e: In 1878, he established the Thirty-fourth Shikoku National Bank (The former Sanwa Bank) and assumed Todori (chief).
sen.cmt: 定冠詞を追加しました。
sen.e: In 1878, he established the Thirty-fourth Shikoku National Bank (The former Sanwa Bank) and assumed Todori (chief).

sen.j: 一方和歌山第四十三、日本共同、中立貯蓄、日本中立の各銀行にも関係。
sen.e: On the other hand, he was related to Wakayama Yonjyu san Bank, Nippon Kyodo Bank, Churitsu Chochiku Bank, Nihon Churitsu Bank.
sen.cmt: 和歌山第四十三、日本共同、中立貯蓄、日本中立銀行の読み方不明です。
sen.e: On the other hand, he was related to Wakayama Yonjyu san Bank, Nippon Kyodo Bank, Churitsu Chochiku Bank, Nihon Churitsu Bank.
On the other hand, he was related to Wakayama Yonjyu san Bank, Nippon Kyodo Bank, Churitsu Chochiku Bank, Nihon Churitsu Bank.

sen.j: さらに大阪・河南の諸鉄道、日本生命保険、日本火災保険、日本倉庫、帝国物産など30余りの事業創設に参画した。
sen.e: Moreover, he participated in the planning of about 30 businesses or more such as railways of Kanan, Osaka Prefecture, Nippon Life Insurance Company, Nippon Fire Insurance Company, Nippon Warehouse, Teikoku Bussan.

Moreover, he participated in the planning of about 30 businesses or more such as railways of Kanan, Osaka Prefecture, Nippon Life Insurance Company, Nippon Fire Insurance Company, Nippon Warehouse, and Teikoku Bussan.

Moreover, he participated in the planning of about 30 businesses or more such as railways of Kanan, Osaka Prefecture, Nippon Life Insurance Company, Nippon Fire Insurance Company, Nippon Warehouse, and Teikoku Bussan.

sen.j: また明治20年（1887年）に天満紡績を設立し社長となり、ほかに日本綿花、日本紡績などの育成・発展に努め、大阪綿紡界の草分けとなった。
sen.e: In 1887, he established Tennma Boseki and became a president and trailblazer in the world of Osaka cotton spinning industry serving a development and growth of Nippon Menka, Nippon Boseki.
In 1887, he established Tennma Boseki and became a president and trailblazer in the world of Osaka cotton spinning industry serving a development and growth of Nippon Menka, Nippon Boseki.
In 1887, he established Tennma Boseki and became a president and trailblazer in the world of Osaka cotton spinning industry serving a development and growth of Nippon Menka, Nippon Boseki.

sen.j: 大阪商業会議所特別議員。
sen.e: He was a special councilor of Osaka Chamber of Commerce.
He was a special councilor of Osaka Chamber of Commerce.
He was a special councilor of Osaka Chamber of Commerce.

sen.j: 明治41年（1908年）隠居して清左衛門と改名。
sen.e: He retired in 1908 and changed his name to Kiyozaemon.
sen.cmt: 清左衛門が、きよざえもんか、せいざえもんか不明です。
sen.e: He retired in 1908 and changed his name to Kiyozaemon.
He retired in 1908 and changed his name to Kiyozaemon.
